Name: Sakini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of green apple peel.
Review: Sake adds an almost wine-like delicacy to this approachable riff on the classic Dry Martini.
History: The "Sake Martini" emerged in the 1980s. This recipe by yours truly in November 2016.
Nutrition: One serving of Sakini contains 159 calories
